root.name: Momotarou Dentetsu 2010: Sengoku Ishin no Hero Daishuugou! no Maki
root.description: Unfortunately, a proposed sequel (Momotarou Dentetsu 2012) was canceled due to the 2011 Tohoku earthquake, and then the entire series put on hold due to Akira Sakuma's quarrel with a person in power at parent company Konami.
